titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I celebrated at 8 a.m. in S. Margt's.

I finished reading a remarkably interesting book:– 'Fourteen Years a Jesuit, a Record of Personal Experience & a Criticism by Count Paul von Hoensbroech'. It is a most damaging exposé of the Jesuit system.
